ARABIC: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِى ضَلَٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: By God, we were plainly in error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By Allah, we were surely in clear error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: they will say, "By God, we were in clear error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “By oath of Allah, we were indeed in open error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By Allah, we were truly in a manifest error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: By Allah! we were certainly in manifest error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: By God, we were certainly in manifest error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By Allah, of a truth we were in error manifest
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By Allah, we have indeed been in an error manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘By Allah, we had indeed been in manifest error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By Allah, we were truly in an error manifest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By Allah, we were truly in a manifest error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By Allah, we were certainly in clear error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “By God, We were in evident error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: By Allah, we were indeed in manifest error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:97]   ‘By God, we had indeed (in, softened in place of the hardened form, with its subject omitted, in other words [it would usually be] innahu) been in manifest error,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By Allah, of a truth we were in error manifest) in the life of the world,
